ai-kv12.8:1.1_0: A person accomplished in view wishes to kill a living being,
ai-kv12.8:1.3_0: A person accomplished in view, because of their mother and father, a murderer. ...
ai-kv12.8:1.6_0: The Realized One could give rise to blood,
ai-kv12.8:1.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.8:2.1_0: A person accomplished in view wishes to kill a living being,
ai-kv12.8:2.3_0: A person accomplished in view disrespects the Teacher.
ai-kv12.8:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.8:2.5_0: By directly knowing and completely understanding thoughts ...
ai-kv12.8:2.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.8:3.1_0: A person accomplished in view doesn’t respect the Teacher.
ai-kv12.8:3.3_0: One who is accomplished in view, but not others who have respect the Teacher.
ai-kv12.8:3.4_0: “Whoever has a person accomplished in view, a living being.”
ai-kv12.8:3.9_0: If a person accomplished in view, you should respect the training, not respectedly.
ai-kv12.8:3.10_0: “Whoever has a person accomplished in view, a living being.”
ai-kv12.8:4.1_0: A person accomplished in view disrespects the Teacher.
ai-kv12.8:4.3_0: A person accomplished in view would come to the Buddha’s conclusion: ‘Consider a teacher of the Buddha’s view!’ ‘He’s the conclusion of the Buddha’s doctrine!’
ai-kv12.8:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.8:5.1_0: A person accomplished in view wishes to kill a living being,
ai-kv12.8:5.4_0: “Mendicants, the ocean is consistent and doesn’t overflow its boundaries.
ai-kv12.8:5.5_0: In the same way, when a training rule is laid down for my disciples they wouldn’t break it even for the sake of their own life.”
ai-kv12.8:5.9_0: “Whoever has a person accomplished in view, a living being.”
ai-kv12.8:5.10_0: The account of the life for you is finished.
